It details charges, payments, and usage for the billing cycle from September 15, 2004, to October 14, 2004, including various service charges and taxes. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for the phone number (561) 379-7824, including call logs, incoming and outgoing calls, and associated charges. It appears to be part of an investigation into the activities surrounding this phone number, potentially linked to Martin Golick. It provides a comprehensive log of calls made and received over a specified period, primarily in Palm Beach, Florida. It provides insights into communication patterns associated with this number, which may be relevant to the Epstein case.
